info.title: Token API
info.description: Power your apps & AI agents with real-time token data.

get.description: Returns ERC-20 transfers with transaction and block data.

network.description: The Graph Network ID for EVM networks https://thegraph.com/networks

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: The Graph Network ID for EVM networks https://thegraph.com/networks

parameters.name: transaction_id
parameters.description:
Filter by transaction hash
Single value or array of values* (separate multiple values with `,`)
*Plan restricted.

parameters.name: contract
parameters.description:
Filter by contract address
Single value or array of values* (separate multiple values with `,`)
*Plan restricted.

parameters.name: from_address
parameters.description:
Filter by address
Single value or array of values* (separate multiple values with `,`)
*Plan restricted.

parameters.name: to_address
parameters.description:
Filter by address
Single value or array of values* (separate multiple values with `,`)
*Plan restricted.

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: UNIX timestamp in seconds or date string (e.g. "2025-01-01T00:00:00Z", "2025-01-01", ...).

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description: UNIX timestamp in seconds or date string (e.g. "2025-01-01T00:00:00Z", "2025-01-01", ...).

parameters.name: start_block
parameters.description: Filter by block number

parameters.name: end_block
parameters.description: Filter by block number

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description:
Number of items* returned in a single request.
*Plan restricted.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description:
Page number to fetch.
Empty `data` array signifies end of results.

get.description:
Returns wallet ERC-20 token balance changes over time in OHLCV format.

OHLCV historical depth is subject to plan restrictions.

network.description: The Graph Network ID for EVM networks https://thegraph.com/networks

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: The Graph Network ID for EVM networks https://thegraph.com/networks

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Filter by address

parameters.name: contract
parameters.description:
Filter by contract address
Single value or array of values* (separate multiple values with `,`)
*Plan restricted.

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description:
The interval* for which to aggregate price data (hourly, 4-hours, daily or weekly).
*Plan restricted.

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: UNIX timestamp in seconds or date string (e.g. "2025-01-01T00:00:00Z", "2025-01-01", ...).

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description: UNIX timestamp in seconds or date string (e.g. "2025-01-01T00:00:00Z", "2025-01-01", ...).

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description:
Number of items* returned in a single request.
*Plan restricted.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description:
Page number to fetch.
Empty `data` array signifies end of results.

get.description: Returns wallet addresses holding NFT collection tokens with quantity and percentage distribution.
